mapper.sql: car_id, car_name, brand_id, brand_cat_id, brand_model_id, offical_price, province, city, area,refresh_time, has_parts , parts , parts_price, add_time, add_user_id, start_date, end_date, car_type, status, invoice_type, sort_order, remark
mapper.insert:
insert into auto_car ( car_name, brand_id, brand_cat_id, brand_model_id, offical_price, province, city, area, refresh_time, has_parts, parts, parts_price, add_time, add_user_id, start_date, end_date, car_type, status, invoice_type, remark, sort_order ) values (
#{carName}, #{brandId}, #{brandCatId}, #{brandModelId}, #{officalPrice}, #{province}, #{city}, #{area}, #{refreshTime}, #{hasParts}, #{parts}, #{partsPrice}, #{addTime}, #{addUserId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{carType}, #{status}, #{invoiceType}, #{remark}, #{sortOrder} )
mapper.update:
update auto_car
car_name = #{carName},
brand_id = #{brandId},
brand_cat_id = #{brandCatId},
brand_model_id = #{brandModelId},
offical_price = #{officalPrice},
province = #{province},
city = #{city},
area = #{area},
refresh_time = #{refreshTime},
has_parts = #{hasParts},
parts = #{parts},
parts_price = #{partsPrice},
add_time = #{addTime},
add_user_id = #{addUserId},
start_date = #{startDate},
end_date = #{endDate},
car_type = #{carType},
status = #{status},
sort_order = #{sortOrder},
remark = #{remark}
where car_id = #{carId}
mapper.select:
select ac.*, p.region_name as province_name, c.region_name as city_name, ab.brand_name, abc.cat_name, abm.model_name
,(select collect_id from auto_collect as auc where auc.target_type = 1 and auc.target_id = ac.car_id and auc.user_id = #{viewUserId}) as collect_id
from auto_car as ac left join auto_region as p on p.region_id = ac.province left join auto_region as c on c.region_id = ac.city inner join auto_brand as ab on ab.brand_id=ac.brand_id inner join auto_brand_cat as abc on abc.cat_id=ac.brand_cat_id inner join auto_brand_model as abm on ac.brand_model_id=abm.model_id
ac.car_id = #{carId}
ac.car_id = (select car_id from auto_order_car where order_id = #{orderId})
